message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $100 is a bit too low for me, but I'm willing to come down to $170. It's a high-quality product that you'll get a lot of use out of.
I'm still interested in the product, but $170 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $140. Can you meet me there?
